page.title: 07Twyford Farm Shop (2)
page.content:
eating apples like Worcester,Ida Red, Discovery and Cox and these supply fruit throughout the season.He also grows Bramley Seedling cooking apples. Also grown are the popular plums Victoria and Marjorie Seedling which he sells on the farm.The trees are very small and so the fruit is easy to pick. Some damsons are grown and damascenes,which are very special.They were given to the Abbot of Evesham by
the Crusaders on their return from the crusades.They brought them in their saddlebags. This fruit was for this reason originally only grown in the Evesham area. It makes an exciting day out because there is so much to see and do.
